definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes

sentences.english: The timing of some stock sales led to shareholder accused her of illegal insider trading.
sentences.chinese: 賣股的時機引起持股人指控她搞非法的內線交易。

sentences.english: It is a scandal for Mr. J be a insider trading arbitrageur.
sentences.chinese: 先生從事內線交易套利是件可恥的事。
